about_the_game:
THE SKY HOLDS ITS SECRETS…

Peachleaf Valley: Arias's Story is the fourth DLC content release for "Peachleaf Valley: Seeds of Love" featuring Arias, Spirit of The Skies as a new romanceable bachelor!

Ascend to a forgotten realm among the clouds, where Arias reigns over mysteries long lost to time. Clever, cunning, and wickedly charming, Arias’s motives remain hidden beneath a mischievous smile, drawing you into a romance that blurs the line between thrill and danger. 🔥🦅

Unravel the enigmatic past of the sky realm and discover Arias’s true nature as secrets of an era gone by begin to surface. As you draw closer to him, the boundary between ally and adversary may shift, and every choice could either strengthen your bond or deepen the mysteries that surround him. ⚔️🌩️

  • Interactive Romance – Engage in thrilling, unpredictable interactions that reveal Arias’s complex personality and the secrets he guards in the sky.

  • Captivating (Optional) Animations – Be captivated by striking animations that bring the sky realm and all of its wonders to life. With our customizable accessibility menu, you can tailor animations to suit your preferences, ensuring an experience as immersive—or streamlined—as you’d like. Craft your ideal playthrough and enjoy Peachleaf Valley your way!

  • Beautiful Background Illustrations – Explore breathtaking hand-drawn backgrounds of floating islands, ancient ruins, and stormy skies that immerse you in the awe of Arias’s domain.

  • Dramatic CG Moments – Collect unforgettable CGs capturing Arias’s most intense and unpredictable moments, blending romance and the thrill of the unknown.

  • Partial Voice Acting – Hear Arias’s sly, smooth charm through performances by professional voice actors, adding depth and intrigue to his every word.

  • New Music Tracks – Discover exclusive tracks that evoke the freedom and danger of the sky, immersing you in Arias’s story.

  • AND Exclusive New Characters and Locations to explore in the Valley!
